summary:
*The Legend of Zelda* is a popular video game series created by Japanese designers Shigeru Miyamoto and Takashi Tezuka. The games follow Link, a brave Hylian hero, and Princess Zelda as they battle the evil Ganon to protect the land of Hyrule. Ganon seeks the powerful Triforce artifact to control the world.

The franchise offers action-adventure gameplay with RPG elements. With over 20 games and various spin-offs, it has been a huge success, even inspiring an animated TV show and manga adaptations. The series is known for its engaging stories, unique characters, and exciting adventures.
title: The Legend of Zelda
